chapters.name: Propaedeutic procedures
chapters.description: Basic medical inspections and measurements of the patient.

chapters.name: Diagnostic procedures
chapters.description: Procedures that can be used to help diagnose the illness of the patient.

chapters.name: Therapeutic procedures
chapters.description: Procedures that are used to treat the illness.

chapters.name: Anesthesia procedures
chapters.description: Treating the patient with global or local anesthesia to enable painless performance of procedures.
